name: bookshelf-flow
description: flow type declarations for bookshelf and a tool to create model files from the postgresql tables

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src -d dist && npm run build-knex && npm run build-bookshelf && npm run copy-flow
scripts.build-knex: rm -rf knex && mkdir knex && cp dist/knex.js knex/index.js && cp src/knex.js knex/index.js.flow
scripts.build-bookshelf: rm -rf bookshelf && mkdir bookshelf && cp dist/bookshelf.js bookshelf/index.js && cp src/bookshelf.js bookshelf/index.js.flow
scripts.test: npm run migrate && npm run create-models && npm run flow && ava
scripts.create-models: rm -f test/models/* && mkdir -p test/models && babel-node src/bin.js --connection postgresql://localhost/bookshelf-flow --model ../../src/bookshelf --tables users,sessions --out test/models --bookshelf '../bookshelf'
scripts.copy-flow: for file in `ls src/`; do cp src/$file "dist/${file/\.js/.js.flow}"; done
